texts.popUpSubline: The address you entered seems to have a problem. Please select an address from options under.
texts.mistakeNoPredictionSubline: Your address could not be verified. Please check and edit or confirm it.
texts.notFoundSubline: Your address could not be verified. Please check and edit or confirm it.
texts.warningText: Incorrect addresses can lead to problems in delivery and cause further costs.
texts.confirmMyAddressCheckbox: I confirm, that my address is correct and deliverable.

statuses.building_number_not_found: This house number could not be found.
statuses.street_name_needs_correction: The spelling of the street is incorrect.
statuses.locality_needs_correction: The spelling of the locality is incorrect.
statuses.country_code_needs_correction: The entered address was found in another country.
statuses.phone_should_be_fixed: A fixed line number is expected here.
statuses.phone_should_be_mobile: A mobile phone number is expected here.

requiredFormat.hintFormatE164: Please write your number in E.164 format, e.g. +4917678134170
requiredFormat.hintFormatInternational: Please write your number in international format, e.g. +49 176 78134170
requiredFormat.hintFormatNational: Please write your number in national format, z.B. 0176 78134170
